snippet: One boy died and another was missing after they were swept away along a popular but treacherous boulder-strewn stretch of the Merced River, Yosemite National Park officials said Thursday.
abstract: Officials at Yosemite National Park say one boy died and another is missing after they were swept away along a popular but treacherous boulder-strewn stretch of the Merced River.
lead_paragraph: One boy died and another was missing after they were swept away along a popular but treacherous boulder-strewn stretch of the Merced River, Yosemite National Park officials said Thursday.

headline.seo: California: Two Boys Swept Away by River at Yosemite
headline.main: California: Two Boys Swept Away by River at Yosemite
headline.print_headline: California: Two Boys Swept Away By River at Yosemite
